channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Get Custom Field Values
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Get Custom Field Values

item.title: CVE-2021-24871|2024-08-03T19:49:12.639Z -- unknown -- get%20custom%20field%20values
item.description: The Get Custom Field Values WordPress plugin before 4.0.1 does not escape custom fields before outputting them in the page, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2021-24872|2024-08-03T19:49:14.018Z -- unknown -- get%20custom%20field%20values
item.description: The Get Custom Field Values WordPress plugin before 4.0 allows users with a role as low as Contributor to access other posts metadata without validating the permissions. Eg. contributors can access admin posts metadata.
